column1: Table S8.5: Separations for selected potentially preventable hospitalisations(a) for Non-Indigenous Australians, per 1,000 population, by state or territory of usual residence, all hospitals, 2022–23
(a)  These conditions are defined using ICD-10-AM codes.  See METeOR item 740851: at https://meteor.aihw.gov.au/content/index.phtml/itemId/740851.
(b) Includes other territories, overseas residents and unknown state of residence.
(c) Excludes multiple diagnoses for the same separation within the same group.
(d) Rheumatic heart disease includes acute rheumatic fever as well as the chronic disease.
Appendix information with notes on definitions and data limitations is available to download at the link below:
